text: Milan Kajkl (May 14, 1950 – January 18, 2014) was a Czechoslovak Olympic ice hockey player. Kajkl was born in Plzeň, Czechoslovakia. He participated at the 1976 Winter Olympics in Innsbruck, where his team won a silver medal. Kajkl died January 18, 2014 in Plzen at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czechoslovak ice hockey players Category:Olympic silver medalists for Czechoslovakia Category:Ice hockey defencemen
title: Milan Kajkl
